subtitle: A delicious combination cooked in the microwave. Serve in pies, tarts or as a filling in cakes.

method.text: Put the pineapple into a large heatproof bowl for 5 min on HIGH, stirring twice.
Scoop out and stir in the flesh and seeds from the halved passion fruit, lemon juice, rind and sugar. Cook for about 15-18 min or until set .
Stir in the brandy. Leave to stand for 10 min then pot

title: Pineapple and passion fruit conserve - Microwave
